DOC.brief_summary: The purpose determine preventive effect Chinese herb supplement panax ginseng salvia miltiorrhiza prior eccentric resistance exercise arterial stiffness vascular reactivity use double-blind randomize control design examine effect 12-week progressive eccentric resistance exercise train arterial elasticity vascular reactivity , whether long-term supplementation would ameliorate arterial stiffen effect elicit exercise-induced inflammation improve endothelial function .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Panax Ginseng Salvia Miltiorrhiza Supplementation Vascular Function
DOC.criteria: Healthy sedentary adult obesity ( BMI > 30 kg/m2 ) smoking within past six month hypertension ( high blood pressure > 140/90 mmHg ) personal history diabetes ( fast blood glucose > 126 mg/dL ) , heart disease , cardiovascular problem orthopedic injury may prevent complete exercise use overthecounter supplement vitamin
